```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

Read data
```{r}


fire<-st_read("mtbs/CA_Fire.shp")
```

Example 1
```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data=fire ,aes(color=Incid_Type) )


  
```

Example 2: aes(color=) is not in the legend anymore
```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data=fire ,aes(color=Incid_Type) , color="yellow" )


  
```

Example 3
```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data=fire ,aes(color=Incid_Type)   )+
  scale_color_manual( name = "Incid_Type", values = c("yellow","blue","purple"))

```
